arm_group.description: PIOLIN® SHAMPOO 5 DAYS CONTINUOUSLY STOP A WEEK AND APPLY AGAIN

brief_summary.textblock:
This study aims to demonstrate the therapeutic efficacy and safety of Shampoo PIOLIN ® in
      the treatment of human pediculosis. Will be treated 212 patients aged 2-60 years with the
      infestation, along with the people in your family life. All will be submitted to the dosing
      regimen recommended in the package insert. 100% of the sample shall be subjected to clinical
      evaluation through comb, pre and post treatment and monitored after thirty days for
      evaluation of safety and possible adverse effects that may arise related to any of the
      components of the formula.

      The efficacy study is active comparator, non-inferiority.

clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety Study for PIOLIN® Shampoo

intervention.description: PIOLIN® SHAMPOO 5 DAYS CONTINUOUSLY STOP A WEEK AND APPLY AGAIN

clinical_study.official_title: Phase 3 Efficacy and Safety Study for PIOLIN® Shampoo to Treat Pediculosis

overall_contact.last_name: KARLA F DEUD JOSÉ, PharmD PhD

overall_contact_backup.last_name: Karla F Deud José, PharmD PhD

authority: Brazil: National Committee of Ethics in Research

primary_outcome.description: AFTER 17 DAYS OF TREATMENT PATIENTS SHOULD HAVE NO INFESTATION - clinically

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: IN THE END OF 30 DAYS TREATMENT PATIENTS WILL BE EVALUATED WITH BLOOD/URINE ANALYSIS FOR CHECKING ANY CHANGE - biochemistry, lab exams

collaborator.agency: Laboratório Saúde Ltda - principal e único patrocinador

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Safety Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment
